body:
Comment 6: 
Here's the expected output for ./all.bash, which was obtained on Windows by using an
improved version of Rob's patch. It matches the output on Linux.

$ env | grep '^GO'
GOBIN=c:\msys\bin
GOARCH=386
GOROOT=c:\msys
GOOS=windows

$ cd /c
$ hg clone -r tip https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ go
$ cd $GOROOT/src
$ pwd
/c/msys/src
$ ./all.bash
<SNIP>
ALL TESTS PASSED
---
Installed Go for windows/386 in /c/msys.
Installed commands in /c/msys/bin.
The compiler is 8g.
